sqlMap.statement: SELECT AMRI.SYS_SRC_CD AS SYS_SRC_CD, AMRI.TRX_CD AS TRX_CD, AMRI.TRX_RSN_CD AS TRX_RSN_CD FROM AJE_MDSE_RECLS_INTFC AMRI WHERE AMRI.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND AMRI.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT '*' FROM AJE_INTFC_CTRL AIC WHERE AIC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND AIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND AIC.AJE_INTFC_TP_CD = #ajeIntfcTpCd# AND AIC.JRNL_CPLT_FLG = #jrnlCpltFlg# AND AIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = AMRI.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND AIC.AJE_INTFC_PK = AMRI.AJE_MDSE_RECLS_INTFC_PK ) GROUP BY AMRI.SYS_SRC_CD, AMRI.TRX_CD, AMRI.TRX_RSN_CD ORDER BY AMRI.TRX_CD, AMRI.TRX_RSN_CD, AMRI.SYS_SRC_CD

SELECT AMRI.GLBL_CMPY_CD AS GLBL_CMPY_CD, AMRI.AJE_MDSE_RECLS_INTFC_PK AS AJE_MDSE_RECLS_INTFC_PK, AMRI.GL_DT AS GL_DT, AMRI.SYS_SRC_CD AS SYS_SRC_CD, SS.SYS_SRC_NM AS SYS_SRC_NM, AMRI.TRX_CD AS TRX_CD, TRX.TRX_NM AS TRX_NM, AMRI.TRX_RSN_CD AS TRX_RSN_CD, TRX_RSN.TRX_RSN_NM AS TRX_RSN_NM, AMRI.INVTY_SNAP_SHOT_PK AS INVTY_SNAP_SHOT_PK, AMRI.INVTY_SNAP_SHOT_DT AS INVTY_SNAP_SHOT_DT, AMRI.MDSE_CD AS MDSE_CD, AMRI.INVTY_LOC_CD AS INVTY_LOC_CD, AMRI.LOC_STS_CD AS LOC_STS_CD, AMRI.STK_STS_CD AS STK_STS_CD, AMRI.INVTY_QTY AS INVTY_QTY, AMRI.ASSET_CD AS ASSET_CD,
AMRI.COST_CCY_CD AS COST_CCY_CD, CCY.ACCT_ARTH_TP_CD AS ACCT_ARTH_TP_CD, CCY.ORCL_CCY_CD AS ORCL_CCY_CD, AMRI.RECLS_AMT AS RECLS_AMT, AMRI.AJE_INTFC_CMNT_TXT AS AJE_INTFC_CMNT_TXT, AMRI.VND_CD AS VND_CD, AMRI.COA_PROD_CD AS COA_PROD_CD
-- CSA NEW , AMRI.RTL_WH_CD AS RTL_WH_CD , AMRI.RTL_SWH_CD AS RTL_SWH_CD , AMRI.MDSE_COST_TP_CD AS MDSE_COST_TP_CD , AMRI.MDSE_INVTY_COST_PCT AS MDSE_INVTY_COST_PCT
-- AT ITEM , AMRI.COA_CC_CD AS "ITEM_CC_CD" , AMRI.COA_PROD_CD AS "ITEM_PROD_CD" , AMRI.COA_PROJ_CD AS "ITEM_PROJ_CD"
-- AT WH , RW.COA_BR_CD AS "WH_BR_CD"
-- AT MT-INV , AMRI.COA_PROJ_CD AS "ITEM_PROJ_CD"
-- AT VND
, NVL(VND.COA_AFFL_CD, CASE WHEN AMRI.COA_PROD_CD = #nonCanon# THEN #affiliteCd# ELSE #cusaGeneral# END) AS "VND_AFFL_CD"
-- AT LINK , AMRI.COA_BR_CD AS "LINK_BR_CD" , AMRI.COA_CC_CD AS "LINK_CC_CD" , AMRI.COA_ACCT_CD AS "LINK_ACCT_CD" , AMRI.COA_PROD_CD AS "LINK_PROD_CD" , AMRI.COA_CH_CD AS "LINK_CH_CD" , AMRI.COA_AFFL_CD AS "LINK_AFFL_CD" , AMRI.COA_PROJ_CD AS "LINK_PROJ_CD" , AMRI.COA_EXTN_CD AS "LINK_EXTN_CD"
, CPA_WIP.COA_ACCT_CD AS COA_ACCT_CD_WIP , CPA_CI.COA_ACCT_CD AS COA_ACCT_CD_CI FROM AJE_MDSE_RECLS_INTFC AMRI, SYS_SRC SS, TRX TRX, TRX_RSN TRX_RSN, CCY CCY ,RTL_WH RW ,VND VND ,COA_PROJ_ACCT CPA_WIP ,COA_PROJ_ACCT CPA_CI WHERE AMRI.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND SS.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND TRX.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND TRX_RSN.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND CCY.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND RW.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND VND.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND CPA_WIP.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND CPA_CI.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND AMRI.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND AMRI.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SS.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND AMRI.SYS_SRC_CD = SS.SYS_SRC_CD AND TRX.GLBL_CMPY_CD = TRX_RSN.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND TRX.TRX_CD = TRX_RSN.TRX_CD AND AMRI.GLBL_CMPY_CD = TRX.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND AMRI.TRX_CD = TRX.TRX_CD AND AMRI.GLBL_CMPY_CD = TRX_RSN.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND AMRI.TRX_RSN_CD = TRX_RSN.TRX_RSN_CD AND AMRI.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CCY.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND AMRI.COST_CCY_CD = CCY.CCY_CD AND AMRI.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RW.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND AMRI.RTL_WH_CD = RW.RTL_WH_CD AND AMRI.GLBL_CMPY_CD = VND.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND AMRI.VND_CD = VND.VND_CD(+) AND AMRI.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CPA_WIP.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND AMRI.COA_PROJ_CD = CPA_WIP.COA_PROJ_CD(+) AND CPA_WIP.COA_PROJ_ACCT_TP_CD(+) = #coaProjAcctTp_WIP# AND AMRI.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CPA_CI.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND AMRI.COA_PROJ_CD = CPA_CI.COA_PROJ_CD(+) AND CPA_CI.COA_PROJ_ACCT_TP_CD(+) = #coaProjAcctTp_CI# AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT '*' FROM AJE_INTFC_CTRL AIC WHERE AIC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND AIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND AIC.AJE_INTFC_TP_CD = #ajeIntfcTpCd# AND AIC.JRNL_CPLT_FLG = #jrnlCpltFlg# AND AIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = AMRI.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND AIC.AJE_INTFC_PK = AMRI.AJE_MDSE_RECLS_INTFC_PK ) ORDER BY AMRI.INVTY_SNAP_SHOT_PK

SELECT AMRI.GLBL_CMPY_CD AS GLBL_CMPY_CD, AMRI.AJE_MDSE_RECLS_INTFC_PK AS AJE_MDSE_RECLS_INTFC_PK, AMRI.GL_DT AS GL_DT, AMRI.SYS_SRC_CD AS SYS_SRC_CD, SS.SYS_SRC_NM AS SYS_SRC_NM, AMRI.TRX_CD AS TRX_CD, TRX.TRX_NM AS TRX_NM, AMRI.TRX_RSN_CD AS TRX_RSN_CD, TRX_RSN.TRX_RSN_NM AS TRX_RSN_NM, AMRI.INVTY_SNAP_SHOT_PK AS INVTY_SNAP_SHOT_PK, AMRI.INVTY_SNAP_SHOT_DT AS INVTY_SNAP_SHOT_DT, AMRI.MDSE_CD AS MDSE_CD, AMRI.INVTY_LOC_CD AS INVTY_LOC_CD, AMRI.LOC_STS_CD AS LOC_STS_CD, AMRI.STK_STS_CD AS STK_STS_CD, AMRI.INVTY_QTY AS INVTY_QTY, AMRI.ASSET_CD AS ASSET_CD, NVL(AMRI.COA_PROD_CD, #prodCdZZ#) AS COA_PROD_CD, NVL(CSPP.COA_CC_CD, CSPP_ANY.COA_CC_CD) AS COA_CC_CD, NVL(CSPP.COA_CH_CD, CSPP_ANY.COA_CH_CD) AS COA_CH_CD, AMRI.THIS_MTH_TOT_STD_COST_AMT AS THIS_MTH_TOT_STD_COST_AMT, AMRI.COST_CCY_CD AS COST_CCY_CD, CCY.ACCT_ARTH_TP_CD AS ACCT_ARTH_TP_CD, CCY.ORCL_CCY_CD AS ORCL_CCY_CD, AMRI.RECLS_AMT AS RECLS_AMT, AMRI.AJE_INTFC_CMNT_TXT AS AJE_INTFC_CMNT_TXT, AMRI.VND_CD AS VND_CD, NVL(AMRI.COA_AFFL_CD, #afflCd000#) AS COA_AFFL_CD, AMRI.COA_ACCT_CD AS COA_ACCT_CD_MC, AMRI.MDSE_CATG_CD AS MDSE_CATG_CD FROM AJE_MDSE_RECLS_INTFC AMRI, SYS_SRC SS, TRX TRX, TRX_RSN TRX_RSN, (SELECT COA_CC_CD, COA_CH_CD, MDSE_OR_PRT_CD, SYS_SRC_CD, TRX_CD, TRX_RSN_CD, COA_PROD_CD FROM COA_SEG_PROD_PTRN WHERE EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND MDSE_OR_PRT_CD = #mdseOrPrtCd# ) CSPP, (SELECT COA_CC_CD, COA_CH_CD, MDSE_OR_PRT_CD, SYS_SRC_CD, TRX_CD, TRX_RSN_CD, COA_PROD_CD, FIRST_PROD_CTRL_CD FROM COA_SEG_PROD_PTRN WHERE EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND MDSE_OR_PRT_CD = #mdseOrPrtCd# AND COA_PROD_CD = #anyProdCd# ) CSPP_ANY, CCY CCY WHERE AMRI.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND SS.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND TRX.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND TRX_RSN.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND CCY.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND AMRI.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND AMRI.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SS.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND AMRI.SYS_SRC_CD = SS.SYS_SRC_CD AND TRX.GLBL_CMPY_CD = TRX_RSN.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND TRX.TRX_CD = TRX_RSN.TRX_CD AND AMRI.GLBL_CMPY_CD = TRX.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND AMRI.TRX_CD = TRX.TRX_CD AND AMRI.GLBL_CMPY_CD = TRX_RSN.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND AMRI.TRX_RSN_CD = TRX_RSN.TRX_RSN_CD AND AMRI.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CCY.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND AMRI.SYS_SRC_CD = CSPP.SYS_SRC_CD(+) AND AMRI.TRX_CD = CSPP.TRX_CD(+) AND AMRI.TRX_RSN_CD = CSPP.TRX_RSN_CD(+) AND AMRI.COA_PROD_CD = CSPP.COA_PROD_CD(+) AND AMRI.SYS_SRC_CD = CSPP_ANY.SYS_SRC_CD(+) AND AMRI.TRX_CD = CSPP_ANY.TRX_CD(+) AND AMRI.TRX_RSN_CD = CSPP_ANY.TRX_RSN_CD(+) AND SUBSTR(AMRI.COA_PROD_CD,1,1) = CSPP_ANY.FIRST_PROD_CTRL_CD(+) AND AMRI.COST_CCY_CD = CCY.CCY_CD AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT '*' FROM AJE_INTFC_CTRL AIC WHERE AIC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND AIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND AIC.AJE_INTFC_TP_CD = #ajeIntfcTpCd# AND AIC.JRNL_CPLT_FLG = #jrnlCpltFlg# AND AIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = AMRI.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND AIC.AJE_INTFC_PK = AMRI.AJE_MDSE_RECLS_INTFC_PK ) ORDER BY AMRI.INVTY_SNAP_SHOT_PK
